case.title: Users should be able to sign in by entering valid date in "Email" and "Password" fields
Users should not be able to sign in by entering invalid email in the "Email" field
Users should not be able to sign in by entering valid email with a space in the "Email" field
Users should not be able to sign in by entering invalid password in the "Password" field
Users should not be able to sign in by leaving "Email" field empty
Users should not be able to sign in by leaving "Password" field empty
Users should not be able to sign in by leaving "Email" and "Password" fields empty
Users should not be able to sign in by entering valid password with a space in the "Password" field
The font of the Sign In screen should be as per the standard
The text of the Sign In screen should be as per the standard
The text color of the Sign In screen should be as per the standard
The entered password in the "Password" field should be hidden with asterisks
Elements in the screen should be properly aligned
Content of the screen should be adjusted appropriately
Users should not be able to sign in by entering valid password in uppercase in the "Password" field
Password eye should be disabled by default in the "Password" field
Users should be redirected to the "Forgot password" screen to recover password by tapping in the "Forgot password" link
Users should be able to receive an email message about password recovery after entering valid email in the "Email" field
A validation message about empty field should appear after leaving the "Email" field empty
A validation message about invalid email should appear after entering invalid email in the "Email" field
Users should be able to sign in with Google by tapping on the [Google] button
Users should be redirected to the "Sign Up" screen after tapping on the "Sign Up" link
User should be able to sign up with correct data
The "Sign up" screen should contain the "Email" field
The "Sign up" screen should contain the "Password" field
The "Sign up" screen should contain the "Repeat password" field
The "Sign up" screen should contain the [CREATE ACCOUNT] button
The "Sign up" screen should contain the "Create an account" title
The "Sign up" screen should contain the "Back" arrow on the top left of the screen
User should be redirected to the "Sign in" screen after tapping on the "Back" arrow
User should be redirected to the choosing role screen after entering email and passwords
User should be able to register using LinkedIn account
User should be able to register using GitHub account
The "Email" field should be highlighted red with the message "This field can't be empty" after trying to register with an unfilled email address
The "Email" field should be highlighted red with the message "Email is already taken" after trying to register with taken email
The "Email" field should be highlighted red with the message "Wrong email" after trying to register with non valid email format
The "Password" field should be highlighted red with the message "This field can't be empty" after trying to register with an unfilled password
The "Repeat Password" field should be highlighted red with the message "This field can't be empty" after trying to register with an unfilled repeated password
The "Repeat Password" field should be highlighted red with the message "Please make sure your passwords match" after trying to register with unmatched passwords
The data in the "Password" field must be covered by asterisks
The data in the "Repeat Password" field must be covered by asterisks
User should be able to choose between "Recruiter" and "Candidate" options on the choosing role screen
Title "I am..." should be displayed on the top of the screen
As candidate User should be able to fill desired position in the "Desired position" field
The "Desired position" field should be highlighted red with the message "This field can't be empty" after trying to register with an unfilled position
As candidate User should be able to select up to 15 tech skills on the Role screen
As candidate User should not be able to select more than 15 tech skills on the Role screen
As candidate User should not be able to continue registration with less than 5 tech skills
As candidate User should be redirected to the "Expectations" screen after tapping [SAVE AND CONTINUE] button
User should be redirected to the "Create an account" screen after tapping on the "Back" arrow
As candidate User should be able to fill expected annual salary on the "Expectations" screen
As candidate User should be able to fill expected monthly salary on the "Expectations" screen
As candidate User should be able to select work experience on the "Expectations" screen
As candidate User should be able to select English level on the "Expectations" field
As candidate User should be able to select location on the "Expectations" field
As candidate User should be redirected to the "Experience" screen after tapping [SAVE AND CONTINUE] button
User should be redirected to the "Role" screen after tapping on the "Back" arrow
As candidate User should be able to fill achievements in the "Achievements/Key results" field on the "Experience" screen
As candidate User should be able to fill work experience in the "Work experience" field on the "Experience" screen
As candidate User should be able to fill job expectations in the "Job expectations" field on the "Experience" screen
As candidate User should be able to continue registration with unfilled "Job expectations" field on the "Experience" screen
As candidate User should be able to export information from LinkedIn on the "Experience" screen
As candidate User should be redirected to the "Bio" screen after tapping [SAVE AND CONTINUE] button
User should be redirected to the "Expectations" screen after tapping on the "Back" arrow
As candidate User should be able to fill first name on the "Contact Information" screen
As candidate User should be able to fill last name on the "Contact Information" screen
As candidate User should be able to upload avatar on the "Contact Information" screen
As candidate User should be able to upload CV on the "Contact Information" screen
As candidate User should be able to provide a link to the LinkedIn profile on the "Contact Information" screen
As candidate User should be able to provide a link to the Behance profile on the "Contact Information" screen
As candidate User should be able to provide a link to the GitHub profile on the "Contact Information" screen
As candidate User should be able to continue registration with unfilled LinkedIn field
As candidate User should be able to continue registration with unfilled Behance field
As candidate User should be able to continue registration with unfilled GitHub field
As candidate User should not be able to continue registration with unfilled "First name" field
As candidate User should not be able to continue registration with unfilled "Last name" field
The "First name" field should be highlighted red with the message "This field can't be empty" after trying to register with an unfilled first name
The "Last name" field should be highlighted red with the message "This field can't be empty" after trying to register with an unfilled last name
As candidate User should be redirected to the "Preview profile" screen after tapping [SAVE AND CONTINUE] button
User should be redirected to the "Experience" screen after tapping on the "Back" arrow
[SAVE AND PREVIEW PROFILE] button should be displayed at the bottom of the screen
As recruiter User should be redirected to the list of candidates screen after completing the registration
As recruiter User should be able to fill the role of the candidate on the required candidates screen
As recruiter User should be able to fill the required technologies on the required candidates screen
As recruiter User should be able to fill the salary on the required candidates screen
As recruiter User should be able to fill the years of experience on the required candidates screen
As recruiter User should be able to fill the English level on the required candidates screen
As recruiter User should be able to fill the timezone on the required candidates screen
As recruiter User should be able to fill in their position in the "My role" field
As recruiter User should be able to fill in their company in the "Company" field
As recruiter User should be able to fill in their contact information in the "Contacts" field
The "My role" field should be highlighted red with the message "This field can't be empty" after trying to register with an unfilled position
The "Company" field should be highlighted red with the message "This field can't be empty" after trying to register with an unfilled company name
As recruiter User should be redirected to the required candidates screen after tapping the [SAVE AND CONTINUE] button
User should be redirected to the choosing role screen after tapping on the "Back" arrow
User should be able to Sign in with Google account by tapping on the [Google] button
User should be redirected to the "All" tab after tapping on the "Chats" icon
The "Delete chat" option should be appeared after holding the chat name
The online status of the chat partner should be displayed on the right of the chat name
User should not be able to send blank message
User should be redirected to the profile screen after tapping on the user avatar
Read status should be displayed next to the message when the receiver has an active chat screen
The "Edit message" option should be appeared after holding message text
The "Delete message" option should be appeared after holding message text
User should be redirected to the "My chats" screen after tapping on the back arrow on the active chat screen
andidate should be able to share their contacts by tapping on the kebab menu in the chat screen
andidate should not be able to initiate new chat with another candidate
andidate should not be able to initiate new chat with recruiter
The [Interested] button should be displayed in the new chat before sending first message
The [Not Interested] button should be displayed in the new chat before sending first message
The [Interested] button should disappeared in the new chat after sending first message
The [Not Interested] button should disappeared in the new chat after sending first message
The template with rejection text should be appeared in the message field after tapping the [Not Interested] button
User should be redirected to the "ARCHIVE" tab after tapping on the "ARCHIVE" link
The "There is no messages yet" text should be displayed on the blank "ARCHIVE" Screen
The "ALL" tab should contain a list of active chats
The chat should be moved to the top of the chat list after sending a message
The "There is no messages yet" text should be displayed on the blank "ALL" Screen
The "Archive chat" option should be appeared after holding the chat name
User should be redirected to the "ALL" tab after tapping on the "ALL" link
User should be able to browse search results after filling at least 1 character in the search field
Search results should be blank after browsing non-existent data
Candidates should be able to swich between candidate and recruiter accounts
Candidates who had activated profile before should be able to deactivate profile by tapping in the [Deactivate profile] button in the "Preview profile"
Candidates who had deactivated profile before should be able to activate profile by tapping in the [Activate profile] button in the "Preview profile"
Candidates should be redirected to the "Profile information" by tapping in the [Edit] button in the "Preview profile" screen
The font of the "Preview profile" screen should be as per the standard
The text of the "Preview profile" screen should be as per the standard
The text color of the "Preview profile" screen should be as per the standard
Elements in the "Preview profile" screen should be properly aligned
Content of the "Preview profile" screen should be adjusted appropriately
"Profile information" screen should contain "Role" tab
"Profile information" screen should contain "Expectations" tab
"Profile information" screen should contain "Experience" tab
Elements in the "Profile information " screen should be properly aligned
Content of the "Profile information" screen should be adjusted appropriately
Candidates should be able to change specialization in the "Select specialization" list of links in the "Role" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able to add new skills in the "Type and select strongest tech" field in the "Role" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able to change data in the "Desired position" field in the "Role" tab
The text color of the "Role" tab screen should be as per the standard
Elements in the "Role" tab should be properly aligned
Content of the "Role" tab should be adjusted appropriately
Candidates should not be able to enter digits instead of letters in the "Desired position" field in the "Role" tab
Candidates should not be able to add less than 5 skills in the "Type and select strongest tech" field in the "Role" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able to change format of salary from monthly to annual by tapping on the [Monthly] button in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able to change format of salary from annual to monthly by tapping on the [Annual] button in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able change salary in the "Desired base salary" field by tapping in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able change work experience by tapping in the "Work experience" list of links in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able change English level by tapping in the "English level" list of links in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able choose location by tapping in the "Your location" field in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able find needed location by tapping in the "Search" after tapping on the "Your location" field in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able to choose remote option by by tapping in the "Remote" checkbox in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able to choose office option by by tapping in the "Office" checkbox in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able find desired location by tapping in the "Office" checkbox in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
The text color of the "Expectations" tab screen should be as per the standard
Elements in the "Expectations" tab should be properly aligned
Content of the "Expectations" tab should be adjusted appropriately
Candidates should not be able to enter letters instead of digits in the "Desired base salary" field by tapping in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should not be able enter digits instead of letters in the "Search" after tapping on the "Your location" field in the "Expectations" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able to write achievements by entering in the "Achievements/Key results" field in the "Experience" tab in the "Profile information" screen
Candidates should be able to write work experience by entering in the "Word experience" field in the "Experience" tab in the "Profile information" screen
